message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think this is a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm very interested in the product, though. Would you be open to $10000?  I'm sure we can find a deal that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $13000. I think this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $13000 is still a little out of my price range. I'm committed to finding a deal, so how about we split the difference and go with $11500?  This would be a fair price for both of us, and would get us closer to a final agreement.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not ready to give up on the value of the product just yet. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to stay closer to my original offer. I'm now offering the product to you for $12500. This is the best I can do, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
